Poland may not be riding on the same pressure of winning any major international competitions anytime soon, but they have always been a footballing nation that qualifies for the World Cups and the European Championships.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Croatia is looking for their first win in five games.
Poland has been without long-serving players Wojciech Szczesny and Kamil Grosicki, the latter of whom has retired from football altogether.
Robert Lewandowski is leading a team without injured striking partner Arkadiusz Milik.
Others: Croatia vs Poland is next in the UEFA Nations League A Group 1 this Sunday.
The Opus Arena in Osijek will be energized to see the hosts grab all three points against the visiting Polish.
